name: tm40
effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Defense Curl Gen I: Skull Bash)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
An extremely fast
attack that can’t
be avoided.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
An extremely fast
attack that can’t
be avoided.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An extremely fast
attack against one
target. It can’t be
evaded.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user confounds the foe with speed,
then strikes. The attack lands without
fail.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user confounds the foe with speed,
then strikes. The attack lands without
fail.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user confounds the foe with speed,
then strikes. The attack lands without
fail.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user confounds the target
with speed, then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user confounds the target
with speed, then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes.
This attack never misses.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user confounds the target with speed, then
slashes. This attack never misses.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user confounds the target with speed, then
slashes. This attack never misses.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon.
This attack never misses.
